title: Jon Hamm, Michael Sheen And David Tennant Talk ‘Good Omens’ | TODAY
author: TODAY
comment: Michael Sheen and David Tennant, simultaneously: First of all, Aziraphale and Crowley are in love, so jot that down

Michael: ''They come to love each other' 'they have been around for so long that they fall a little bit in love with each other'
David: ''celestial odd couple''

Anyone: So they’re best friends right? A buddy comedy???? Right????????

David Tennant and Michael Sheen: They’re in love. A celestial couple. Been married for centuries. They’re 100% definitely in love.
Michael sheen pushes harder for ineffable husbands to be accepted as canon than I worked for my GCSEs
description:
“Good Omens” stars Jon Hamm, Michael Sheen and David Tennant join the 3rd hour of TODAY to talk about playing a funny group of angels and demons in the new Amazon comedy. Plus, they get in on our new Fun Fact Friday game.
» Subscribe to TODAY:
